position: Data Science Analyst @ Accenture || IIT Kharagpur '22

experience.title: Machine Learning
experience.description: Objective: To analyze the Excitation-Emission Matrix dataset for bacteria detection using machine learning techniques• Standardized the dataset and used LabelEncoder for the target variable and gridSearchCV for hyperparameter tuning of the model• Achieved an accuracy of 91.5% in bacteria classification by applying models like random forest, decision tree, and logistic regression• Applied VGG-19 along with data augmentation on the image dataset generated by Spectramax M5 and achieved an accuracy of 82%
experience.description_html: Objective: To analyze the Excitation-Emission Matrix dataset for bacteria detection using machine learning techniques• Standardized the dataset and used LabelEncoder for the target variable and gridSearchCV for hyperparameter tuning of the model• Achieved an accuracy of 91.5% in bacteria classification by applying models like random forest, decision tree, and logistic regression• Applied VGG-19 along with data augmentation on the image dataset generated by Spectramax M5 and achieved an accuracy of 82%

positions.subtitle: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur

experience.title: Strategy and Planning
experience.description: Objective: To work with the founding team on analyzing the online fresh produce market and hypothesis strategies to develop the business model• Reported 6 key business insights of the online fresh produce market by carrying out market research to understand the current supply chain• Developed 4 key business strategies across the supply chain to strengthen doorstep delivery b-model and expanded distribution channels
